headline: Will BLDR's Las Vegas Acquisitions Mark a Turning Point in Its Value-Added Growth Strategy?
summary: Builders FirstSource recently announced the acquisitions of Builder's Door & Trim and Rystin Construction in the Las Vegas area, expanding its presence in turnkey millwork solutions. This move fills a previous gap in the region and aligns with the company's ongoing efforts to broaden value-added product offerings in key growth markets. We'll explore how this Las Vegas expansion could influence Builders FirstSource's outlook as it seeks higher-margin growth opportunities. Trump has pledged to...

headline: Celsius Holdings and Builders FirstSource have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: CELH surges with record-breaking growth, while BLDR struggles under pressure.

headline: Bear of the Day: Builders FirstSource (BLDR)
summary: A challenging operating environment for BLDR has caused analysts to slash EPS expectations across the board. But given strength off 2025 lows, can the tide soon be turning?
